headline: Consumer behavior is shifting; can banks keep up?

headline: Is Mastercard Still Attractive After Digital Payments Expansion And Strong Multi Year Gains?
summary: If you are wondering whether Mastercard at around $563 a share is still a smart buy, or if most of the upside is already priced in, you are not alone. That is exactly what this breakdown will unpack. Over the last year the stock is up 6.4%. That sits on top of a hefty 65.6% gain over three years and 72.0% over five years, with a recent 3.9% rise in the last week and 0.9% over the last month suggesting that sentiment remains quietly bullish. Recent headlines have focused on Mastercard...
